Description: Contains information about clients including unique ID, name, contact person details, email, phone, address, and other relevant details. Essential for managing client relationships and contact information.
Stores details of employees such as unique ID, first and last names, email, phone number, hire date, job title, department, salary, and address. Crucial for HR and organizational management.
Records assignments of employees to projects including assignment ID, project ID, employee ID, assigned date, and role. Key for tracking project resource allocation.
Holds details about projects including project ID, name, client ID, start and end dates, status, budget, and description. Central for project management and client interaction.
Contains information about services offered including service ID, name, description, and price. Essential for managing service catalog and pricing.
